meanings.definition: A person who strikes or hits something forcefully.
meanings.sent1: The baseball player swung the basher with all his might.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker used the basher to break up the concrete.
meanings.sent3: The basher hit the nail so hard, it flew across the room!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a basher, striking fear into his heart.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the basher hitting the metal echoed through the warehouse.

meanings.definition: A person who criticizes or attacks someone or something harshly.
meanings.sent1: The online basher left mean comments on the post.
meanings.sent2: The movie critic was known as a harsh basher of new films.
meanings.sent3: The food basher complained about every dish at the restaurant.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a basher, tearing down his self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The political basher always finds something negative to say about the candidates.
